an4.110:4.1: * “Cattārome, bhikkhave, āsīvisā.
an4.110:4.3: Āgataviso na ghoraviso, ghoraviso na āgataviso, āgataviso ca ghoraviso ca, nevāgataviso na ghoraviso—
an4.110:4.5: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro āsīvisūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.110:4.7: Āgataviso na ghoraviso, ghoraviso na āgataviso, āgataviso ca ghoraviso ca, nevāgataviso na ghoraviso.
an4.110:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso hoti, na ghoraviso?
an4.110:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati.
an4.110:5.3: So ca khvassa kodho na dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
an4.110:5.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso hoti, na ghoraviso.
an4.110:5.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso āgataviso, na ghoraviso;
an4.110:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo ghoraviso hoti, na āgataviso?
an4.110:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati.
an4.110:6.3: So ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
an4.110:6.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ghoraviso hoti, na āgataviso.
an4.110:6.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso ghoraviso, na āgataviso;
an4.110:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso ca hoti ghoraviso ca?
an4.110:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati.
an4.110:7.3: So ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
an4.110:7.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso ca hoti ghoraviso ca.
an4.110:7.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso āgataviso ca ghoraviso ca;
an4.110:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo nevāgataviso hoti na ghoraviso?
an4.110:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati.
an4.110:8.3: So ca khvassa kodho na dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
an4.110:8.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nevāgataviso hoti, na ghoraviso.
an4.110:8.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso nevāgataviso na ghoraviso;
an4.110:8.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro āsīvisūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
